  • Method Details

    • aggridContent

      @PostMapping(value={"/api/ux/aggrid/{masterTableNameOrViewName}.json","/api/ux/aggrid/{schemaName}/{masterTableNameOrViewName}.json"}, consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public ServerRowsResponse aggridContent(@PathVariable(required=false) String schemaName, @PathVariable String masterTableNameOrViewName, @RequestBody @Nonnull ServerRowsRequest payload, @RequestHeader(value="X-Include-Generated-SQL-In-Response",required=false) boolean includeGeneratedSqlInResp, @RequestHeader(value="X-Include-Generated-SQL-In-Error-Response",required=false,defaultValue="true") boolean includeGeneratedSqlInErrorResp)

    • getRecords

      @GetMapping("/api/ux/get-records/{schemaName}/{masterTableNameOrViewName}/{columnName}/{columnValue}.json") @ResponseBody public Object getRecords(@PathVariable(required=false) String schemaName, @PathVariable String masterTableNameOrViewName, @PathVariable String columnName, @PathVariable String columnValue)

    • serverRowsResponse

      public static ServerRowsResponse serverRowsResponse(@Nonnull org.jooq.DSLContext dsl, @Nonnull ServerRowsRequest ssRequest, @Nullable String schemaName, @Nonnull String masterTableNameOrViewName, boolean includeGeneratedSqlInResp, boolean includeGeneratedSqlInErrorResp, @Nullable Consumer<List<Map<String,Object>>> customizeRows)
      Generates a ServerRowsResponse by executing a SQL query dynamically.
      Parameters:
      dsl - The DSL context to be used for the query.
      schemaName - The schema name of the table or view, can be null.
      masterTableNameOrViewName - The name of the master table or view.
      includeGeneratedSqlInResp - Whether to include the generated SQL in the response.
      includeGeneratedSqlInErrorResp - Whether to include the generated SQL in the error response.
      customizeRows - A nullable function that accepts a list of rows (as maps) and allows modification of the row entries before creating the response.
      payload - The request payload containing the query details.
      Returns:
      A ServerRowsResponse object containing the result of the query.
